sentence.Network_en: Her life has been per-manently blighted by his heinous crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 他犯下的滔天罪行给她的生活蒙上了永久的阴影。

sentence.Network_en: His career has been blighted by injuries.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的事业不断受到伤病的困扰。

sentence.Network_en: The frost has blighted my crops.
sentence.Network_cn: 霜冻使我的庄稼枯萎了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: his reputation was blighted by his bad behavior ., 他的名誉为他的行为不检所毁.
He made the fire flare , and threw aa blighted tree , which quickly blazed., 他把火拨旺 , 加了一块枯木 , 火立刻熊熊地燃烧起来.
blemish (to spoil by a flaw)blighted adj 植物枯萎的bliss (complete happiness)
Her life was blighted by an unhappy marriage ., 她的一生被不幸的婚姻所毁.

list.abs: Wageningen大学的一个研究组在7月的Genome Research杂志上报道说，他们已经确定出一种导致马铃薯疫病（potato blight）的病原体的独特基因指纹。一些病原体株具有一个特殊基因的多个拷贝，而另外一些病原体株则只有一个拷贝。

entry.def: You can refer to something as a blight when it causes great difficulties, and damages or spoils other things.

example.ex: This discriminatory policy has really been a blight on America...
example.tran: 这项歧视性政策确实成了美国的一大祸根。

example.ex: Manchester still suffers from urban blight and unacceptable poverty.
example.tran: 曼彻斯特仍然受到城区脏乱和严重贫困问题的困扰。

entry.tran: 破坏（生活）；使（希望）破灭；摧毁；损毁
entry.def: If something blights your life or your hopes, it damages and spoils them. If something blights an area, it spoils it and makes it unattractive.

example.ex: An embarrassing blunder nearly blighted his career before it got off the ground.
example.tran: 一个令人难堪的疏忽几乎毁掉了他还没有起步的事业。

example.ex: ...thousands of families whose lives were blighted by unemployment.
example.tran: 成千上万因为失业而难以维持生计的家庭

entry.def: Blight is a disease which makes plants dry up and die.

means.word_mean: 1. affected by blight--anything that mars or events growth or prosperity;

auth_sentence.content: The place has been blighted for the entire winter.
auth_sentence.res_content: The place has been blighted for the entire winter.

auth_sentence.res_content: Campaigners claimed the list blighted lives by denying people employment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Campaigners claimed the list blighted lives by denying people employment.

auth_sentence.content: Let us not waste them in mourning over blighted hopes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Let us not waste them in mourning over blighted hopes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let us not waste them in mourning over blighted hopes.
